# NFCTag.iso7816(_:)

**Case**

Gets a tag as an ISO 7816 tag object.

## Declaration

```swift
case iso7816(any NFCISO7816Tag)
```

## Getting a Specific Tag Type

- **NFCTag.iso15693(_:)**: Gets a tag as an ISO 15693 tag object.
- **NFCTag.feliCa(_:)**: Gets a tag as a FeliCa tag object.
- **NFCTag.miFare(_:)**: Get a tag as a MIFARE tag object.
